name: Geo-Jammed
description:
*For now the game is broken so don't download*

Geo-Jammed is a simple local multiplayer game where you try to unlock and reach the goal while preventing your opponents from doing the same. 

Controls are in "How To Play"

Not 100% on how simple it is, since I've never posted to itch but I plan on updating with  a fix and also Audio.
